member.summary: Represents a sentence 'Subject-Predicate-Object' for data intelligence purposes.
member.remarks: A sentence represents a certain timestamped action of a subject (client from a sentence source) that potentially uses/affects an object. A sentence can also be used to represent a state of a subject.

member.name: T:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.ISubjectMappingClient
member.summary: Represents an object exposing the functionality provided by the mappings restful service. It is used to import mappings between one and the same subjects coming from different sources.

member.name: M:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.ISubjectMappingClient.ImportSubjectMappings(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.SubjectMapping})
member.summary: The method imports collection of SubjectMapping objects to the Telerik.DataIntelligence server. The method sends the objects in batches with the most efficient chunk size. There are no limitations to the number of objects to be passed to the method. The operation is asynchronous.
member.example:
Sample usage:
client.ImportSubjectMappings(mappings); //the mappings are imported in background, the method returns immediately.
client.ImportSubjectMappings(mappings).Wait(); //the execution is blocked until all of the mappings are imported.
int imported = client.ImportSubjectMappings(mappings).Result; //the execution is blocked until all of the mappings are imported. Returns the number of imported mappings.
member.exception: The exception is thrown when one or more of the background tasks have failed. Check the InnerExceptions property for more details
member.param: a collection of SubjectMapping objects to be transmitted to the server

member.name: M:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.ISubjectMappingClient.ImportSubjectMapping(Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.SubjectMapping)
member.summary: The method imports single SubjectMapping object to the Telerik.DataIntelligence server. The operation is asynchronous.
member.example:
Sample usage:
client.ImportSubjectMappings(mapping); //the mapping is imported in background, the method returns immediately.
client.ImportSubjectMappings(mapping).Wait(); //the execution is blocked until all of the mapping is imported.
member.exception: The exception is thrown when there is server side or communication problem. Check the InnerExceptions property for more details
member.param: a SubjectMapping object to be transmitted to the server
